content: knitted jumper with round yoke in drops merino extra fine or lima the piece is worked top down in nordic pattern with sheep s - xxxl pattern no me-159 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 450-500-550-600-650-700 g colour 05 light grey 100-100-100-100-100-100 g colour 19 light grey blue 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 01 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 02 black **or** use drops lima from garnstudio 450-500-550-600-650-750 g colour 9015 grey 100-100-100-100-100-100 g colour 6235 grey blue 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 0100 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 8903 black **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles** drops double pointed needles and circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles and circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
